text: Help plz…Does anyone know which email templates are optimized for email size reduction? Our emails are getting clipped by Gmail :disappointed: We do want to keep the links and CTA, I wonder if we can find a template that’s efficiently coded to give us room for more content?
This is a hared one. It all depends on the amount of Text as well. The onlything that wont have an issue is images cause only the image tag adds to the weight
also, the amount of Module Groups is important
but if you have too much text, wont matter :disappointed:
interesting, i always thought that it is not about the content, but the html size
so if you have 10kb html code, you could have 100.000 lines of text…thats what i read a couple of weeks ago….is that false?
hi yidan, here are some helpful tips that might help you with this issue: <https://mailchimp.com/help/gmail-is-clipping-my-email/>

It's based on the file size of the HTML output of the email, which includes all HTML code and copy that makes up the email. File size of images is not included. Therefore, the more content you have = the more HTML you have = the larger the file size of the email's HTML. If you're using a drag-and-drop or some other editor that builds the email for you, usually it contains a lot of extra bloat (code), and can increase the file size quickly. Custom coded emails allows you to have more control for that.
